entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
